title: core-binding
description: The base properties used in all top-level types

_type.description: Hardcoded value to indicate what type of construct this is

_id.description: Globally Unique Identifier for this construct. MUST be a UUIDv4.

_timestamp.description: Time at which this construct was created. MUST be a UTC time.

external_ids.description: A list of external identifiers by which this construct may be known.

source.description: The source of this ID, i.e. name of an external system

producer.description: The original producer of this representation.

_marking_refs.description: The set of markings to be applied to this construct
